snippet.title: Play the Plumbum demo on STEAM!
snippet.description:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3503990/Plumbum/

PLUMBUM is a retro top-down roguelike shooter where you'll have to survive the innumerable hordes of mooks and goons in the cursed corridors of this cursed game. Will you survive as long as you can, or will you die trying?

=============================
🍞 Sub for bread: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCPjVVH13l4Ch8tS3Zb5MJcQ?sub_confirmation=1
💸 Support us at http://becomeagoon.today
🛒 Amazon Wishlist (if you want to donate something useful): https://www.amazon.es/hz/wishlist/ls/2476MA5XT5RR2?ref_=wl_share
📰 Sign up to our FREE newsletter! https://jmaa.tv/newsletter
Get a FREE Goon Fund sample by signing up to our newsletter!
📖 Read The Joanmarillion: https://jmaa.tv/joanmarillion
In eBook and Hardcover format!
👤 Socials and other links: https://linktr.ee/JMAATV
🦋 Chief Not Twit: https://bsky.app/profile/jmaa.tv
📻 JMAA LIVE! Deluxe Podcast: https://www.youtube.com/@JLDExperience
